titles.title: Police and Fire Station Modernization Act of 2008
Police and Fire Station Modernization Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to authorize tax credit bonds for capital improvements for police and fire departments.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: Police and Fire Station Modernization Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for investment in bonds to finance capital expenditures for state and local police or fire departments. Terminates such credit after 2014.
